thread.title: California residents advised to evacuate ahead of potential mudslides

title: California residents advised to evacuate ahead of potential mudslides
text:
California residents advised to evacuate ahead of potential mudslides Thursday, March 01, 2018 - 00:51 
Just weeks after deadly mudslides devastated parts of Southern California, thousands have been advised to leave their homes ahead of a rainstorm that could again trigger dangerous conditions. Linda So reports.   
Just weeks after deadly mudslides devastated parts of Southern California, thousands have been advised to leave their homes ahead of a rainstorm that could again trigger dangerous conditions. Linda So reports.  //reut.rs/2HWvQJ6
